name: Kay Bailey Hutchison
office: 22nd United States Permanent Representative to NATO
term_start: August 28, 2017!-- Like all ambassadors, Hutchison doesn't formally assume office after Senate confirmation until she presents her credentials to the head of the entity she was accredited to, in this case to the Secretary General of Nato. Please note that the swearing-in ceremony is just the formal promulgation of the State Department to dispense her as its representative, and is not the date she officially begins as Ambassador. See: Diplomatic accreditation and Diplomatic credentials. -->
